text: Brían Nguyen (born on July 16, 2003) is the first transgender person to win a local Miss America beauty contest. She won the Miss Greater Derry event on Sunday, November 6, 2022. Being transgender means she is a person who was born male but identifies as a woman. After she won, she also started the #QueensAreEverywhere movement. She helps young women and men feel more confident and strong. Nguyen went to Nashua Community College and took a business class. == Accomplishments == Before starting the #Queens Forever Movement, the 19-year-old Nguyen won the 2023 Miss Greater Derry beauty pageant. She was the first ever local trans woman to do so. After she won, she got the title of “Miss Greater Derry 2023,” a crown, and money to pay for school. == References == Category:Pages created with the Article Wizard from 2023 Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Transgender women Category:Beauty pageant winners Category:People from New Hampshire
title: Brían Nguyen
